nodes.text: The Coruscant Industrial Zone Detention Center was a detention center located in the Industrial District of the planet Coruscant's Galactic City. The structure was abandoned by the year 21 BBY and became a secret hideout for the bounty hunter Cad Bane. C-3PO and R2-D2 were captured and brought to the detention center, where Bane's modified 8D-series smelter droid J0-N0 tortured them for information on the Senate Building.
